content: the ghastly ghosties the ghastly ghosties pattern is not intended for replication or sale by other entities separate from catskitchen as either a physical copy or digital copy it is intended for individual use only feel free to do as you please with the finished product i just ask to be tagged written in 2025 by catskitchen catskitschen 2025 notes this is a late-beginner to intermediate friendly crochet pattern this is a create your own adventure this pattern includes two base bodies one simple beginner friendly ghostie and one more frilly intermediate friendly ghostie on top of this you can customise your ghostie buddy with optional additions like arms legs ears and bows you can add as many or as little of the customisations as you like i can only imagine what an eight legged 3-armed ghostie pal would look like this pattern is worked in a continuous spiral/round as many amigurumi are the stitches primarily used are the single_crochet double_crochet stacked single_crochet slip stitch and chain for the intermediate body it also includes back post single_crochet increases and decreases are also used the pieces of this pattern start with a magic circle it is written in us terms and the measurements provided are in cm extra note i personally like to make the accessories/customisations prior to making the body so that i can sew the pieces on before stu cid 431 ing this creates what i find to be a more secure join if you want to start with the body first you can but in order for the legs if you choose to add legs to be attached in a no sew manner they must be made first if you want to sew everything together in the end then you can make it in whichever order you like abbreviations and stitches magic_ring if you struggle with a magic_ring you can always chain 3 and then work the stitches required into the 3rd chain from hook it will leave a tiny hole though chain= chain single_crochet= single_crochet pro tip if you do a yarn under single_crochet rather than a yarn over single_crochet the gaps between stitches will be smaller and hence hide the stu cid 431 ing better stsc = stacked single_crochet double_crochet= double_crochet slip_stitch= slip_stitch flo= front loop only blo= back loop only bpsc= back post single_crochet decrease = single_crochet two stitches together/decrease an invisible decrease is also fine to use catskitschen 2025 yarn dk weight/8ply yarn 150m if you want to make the stripey leg version colour a black colour b pink hook size 3mm hook i tend to crochet tightly though please use a hook required to create stitches small enough to hide the stu cid 431 ing finished measurements 12cm tall 9cm wide you will need safety eyes stu cid 431 ing scissors and a yarn needle catskitschen 2025 the pattern this pattern is worked in continuous rounds the accessories optional legs make 2 starting in colour b round 1 6sc in a magic_ring 6st
